General.Name: WW Holding Inc
General.Description: WW Holding Inc., together with its subsidiaries, engages in manufacturing and selling of sports equipment, clothing, and accessories; handbags; belts; suitcases; and leather accessories in Taiwan. The company operates in two segments, Sports Equipment Business and Luxury Bag business. The company offers sports equipment and accessories, including protective gear, helmets, teeth and wrist protectors, gloves, shock-proof pants, angle protectors, and ankle and knee protectors, as well as related medical aid devices; and bags, such as leather bags, backpacks, luggage, and commercial bags products. It also acts as an agent for selling tennis and badminton products under the PRINCE brand. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Grand Cayman, the Cayman Islands.
General.Address: Grand Pavilion, Grand Cayman, Cayman Islands, KY1-1205
